description: You know there is always one person who stands out at the gym with his great physique and beauty. Frank L. Is that guy. I've seen him a couple of times during my workout, we exchanged salutations, nothing more. But this one time we started to chat. He asked me about my work and looked curious to know more about how the shootings are made and what it's like to perform in front of the camera. So we rented a Suite at a motel nearby and started to shoot some small segments, just to put him at ease. Frank is a str8 dude so I put some porn on to get him excited and asked him to enjoy himself. I didn't know he was well-endowed and that he shoots lots of cum. That was the icing on the cake.
title: Frank L., Scene #01
